lead_paragraph: Emily Brydon of Canada won a super-G for her first World Cup victory, while Lindsey Vonn just missed a top-three finish in St. Moritz, Switzerland. Vonn, who missed the podium by 0.01, is second in the World Cup standings, 89 points behind Nicole Hosp.
